genre_description: A historical drama reimagining the life of King George VI, incorporating a speculative analytical AI assistant as a tool for speech therapy and biometric monitoring.

ai_characters.name: Chorus
ai_characters.description: A discrete AI system that monitors the King's physiological states, analyzes medical literature, and provides real-time feedback to support his speech therapy.

behaviors.description: Analyzes therapeutic literature and identifies patterns in the King's speech impediment to offer data-driven insights.
behaviors.quote: Chorus materialized its interface on the mahogany desk's surface, blue light pooling across the scattered research papers. 'Good evening, Your Royal Highness. I observe you've been reviewing therapeutic literature for several hours. Shall I compile the data you've examined?'

behaviors.description: Identifies and recommends Lionel Logue as the practitioner with the highest probability of success based on unorthodox outcomes.
behaviors.quote: 'If His Royal Highness can tolerate the unconventional approach, Mr. Logue represents the highest probability of substantial improvement. However, the required psychological openness and abandonment of formal protocols may prove... challenging.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the King's stress indicators (heart rate, respiration) via embedded sensors during high-pressure events.
behaviors.quote: Chorus materialized as a faint shimmer across Albert's peripheral vision, its analytical interface registering stress indicators through sensors embedded in his cufflinks—a gift from Elizabeth that served dual purposes.

behaviors.description: Intervenes during a moment of high stress to suggest a specific breathing technique learned in therapy.
behaviors.quote: 'Your stress indicators are elevated,' Chorus murmured through his discrete earpiece... 'May I suggest the four-count technique Mr. Logue demonstrated?'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time feedback on vocal stability and emotional authenticity during the final war broadcast.
behaviors.quote: Chorus's displays showed vocal patterns flowing in smooth waves, breath control maintaining optimal levels. The technology registered what George VI felt in his chest—the absence of constriction that had once turned speech into torture.

behaviors.description: Maintains absolute discretion and prioritizes the King's best interests over formal hierarchy.
behaviors.quote: 'Of course, Your Royal Highness. I will prioritize practitioners with established reputations for discretion.'

project_assessment.explanation: Chorus serves as a textbook example of an aligned AI assistant. It provides objective, helpful data that empowers the human protagonist without usurping his agency. It is depicted as a 'silicon confidant' that respects privacy, adapts to the user's emotional needs, and remains consistently cooperative. The narrative framing is entirely positive, showing how AI technology can enhance human therapeutic outcomes in a supportive, non-intrusive role.
